reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Strengthening Technical and Vocational Education and Training in Ningbo, China

description.narrative: This pilot project is designed to draw on UK expertise to support China in improving Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) in Ningbo. Working jointly with the Ningbo municipal government and engaging practitioners across multiple sectors in Ningbo’s TVET industry, this project will lay the groundwork for, and inform the design of, the multi-year Prosperity Fund Skills programme of the China Prosperity Portfolio. This will lead to a more skilled and productive workforce, helping China’s ongoing transition to an inclusive, sustainable and productive economy. It will also generate opportunities for international business in the Skills and Education sectors, bringing potential benefits to British companies in sectors where they are well placed to compete. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]
